sen.j: 中村 鶴蔵（なかむら つるぞう）は、歌舞伎役者の名跡。
sen.e: Tsuruzo NAKAMURA is a hereditary name of a line of traditional Japanese Kabuki drama actors.
Tsuruzo NAKAMURA is a hereditary name of a line of traditional Japanese Kabuki drama actors.
Tsuruzo NAKAMURA is a hereditary name of a line of traditional Japanese Kabuki drama actors.

sen.j: 歌舞伎俳優・屋号は舞鶴屋。
sen.e: Kabuki actor/household monogram `Maizuru-ya`.
Kabuki actor/household monogram 'Maizuru-ya.'
sen.cmt: 全角の’を半角にしました。
sen.e: Kabuki actor/household monogram 'Maizuru-ya.'

sen.j: 中村鶴蔵 (初代)（1865年襲名）
sen.e: Tsuruzo NAKAMURA (1st generation)(inherited the name in 1865)
Tsuruzo NAKAMURA (First generation) (inherited the name in 1865)
sen.cmt: Firstに訂正しました。スペース補足しました。
sen.e: Tsuruzo NAKAMURA (First generation) (inherited the name in 1865)

sen.j: ―後の3代目中村仲蔵。
sen.e: Followed on as Nakazo NAKAMURA (III).
Followed on as Nakazo NAKAMURA (III).
Followed on as Nakazo NAKAMURA (III).

sen.j: 著書に「手前味噌｣。
sen.e: Writings: 'Singing My Praises'.
Writings: 'Singing My Praises.'
sen.cmt: ピリオドの位置を訂正しました。
sen.e: Writings: 'Singing My Praises.'

sen.j: 中村鶴蔵 (2代目)（1831年～1890年・江戸生まれ）
sen.e: Tsuruzo NAKAMURA (II)
Tsuruzo NAKAMURA (II) (1831 - 1890, born in Edo)
Tsuruzo NAKAMURA (II) (1831 - 1890, born in Edo)

sen.j: ―初代の弟子。
sen.e: Pupil of the first generation/founder.
Pupil of the first generation/founder.
Pupil of the first generation/founder.

sen.j: 中村鶴蔵 (3代目)（1884年～1927年・東京生まれ）
sen.e: Tsuruzo NAKAMURA (III)
Tsuruzo NAKAMURA (III) (1884 - 1927, born in Tokyo)
Tsuruzo NAKAMURA (III) (1884 - 1927, born in Tokyo)

sen.j: ―中村明石門下に入り、中村亀松の名で1896年に歌舞伎座で初舞台。
sen.e: Became a pupil of Akashi NAKAMURA, using the name 中村亀松 he first stepped on the Kabuki stage in 1896.Akashi
Became a pupil of Akashi NAKAMURA, using the name Kamematsu NAKAMURA, he first stepped on the Kabuki stage at Kabuki-za Theatre in 1896.
sen.cmt: 不要なスペースを削除しました。中村亀松→Kamematsu NAKAMURA,訳漏れ 歌舞伎座、補足しました。不要な語を削除しました。
sen.e: Became a pupil of Akashi NAKAMURA, using the name Kamematsu NAKAMURA, he first stepped on the Kabuki stage at Kabuki-za Theatre in 1896.

sen.j: 1911年に明治座で2世市川左團次の口上で名題披露をして、三代目を襲名。
sen.e: Gained a reputation making prologues to Sadanji ICHIKAWA (II) at the Meijiza Theater in 1911and inherited the name as 3rd generation.
Gained a reputation making prologues to Sadanji ICHIKAWA (II) at the Meiji-za Theater in 1911 and inherited the name as the third generation.
sen.cmt: ハイフン補足しました。the thirdスペルアウトしました。
sen.e: Gained a reputation making prologues to Sadanji ICHIKAWA (II) at the Meiji-za Theater in 1911 and inherited the name as the third generation.

sen.j: 中村鶴蔵 (4代目)（1899年～1945年・東京生まれ）
sen.e: Tsuruzo NAKAMURA (IV)
Tsuruzo NAKAMURA (IV) (1899 - 1945, born in Tokyo)
Tsuruzo NAKAMURA (IV) (1899 - 1945, born in Tokyo)

sen.j: ―三代目の実弟。
sen.e: Younger brother of 3rd generation.
Younger brother of the third generation.
sen.cmt: the thirdスペルアウトしました。
sen.e: Younger brother of the third generation.

sen.j: 前進座の創立に参加。
sen.e: Participated in the opening of the Zenshinza Theatre.
Participated in the opening of the Zenshin-za Theatre.
sen.cmt: ハイフン補足しました。
sen.e: Participated in the opening of the Zenshin-za Theatre.

sen.j: 1933年に四代目を襲名。
sen.e: Inherited the 4th generation title in 1933.
Inherited the fourth generation title in 1933.
sen.cmt: fourthスペルアウトしました。
sen.e: Inherited the fourth generation title in 1933.

sen.j: 前名は中村亀松。
sen.e: His former name was 中村亀松.
His former name was Kamematsu NAKAMURA.
His former name was Kamematsu NAKAMURA.

sen.j: 中村鶴蔵 (5代目)（1925年～・東京生まれ）
sen.e: Tsuruzo NAKAMURA (V)
Tsuruzo NAKAMURA (V) (1925 -, born in Tokyo)
Tsuruzo NAKAMURA (V) (1925 -, born in Tokyo)

sen.j: ―四代目の子。
sen.e: 4th generation of children
The fourth generation of children
sen.cmt: The fourthスペルアウトしました。
sen.e: The fourth generation of children

sen.j: 1932年に中村鶴松の名で初舞台。
sen.e: He first appeared on the Kabuki stage in 1932 under the name of 中村鶴松.
He first appeared on the Kabuki stage in 1932 under the name of Tsurumatsu NAKAMURA.
He first appeared on the Kabuki stage in 1932 under the name of Tsurumatsu NAKAMURA.

sen.j: 創立間もない前進座の子役として活躍。
sen.e: Soon after the Zenshinza Theatre was established he became active in children`s roles.
Soon after the Zenshin-za Theatre was established he became active in children's roles.
sen.cmt: ハイフン補足しました。全角の’を半角にしました。
sen.e: Soon after the Zenshin-za Theatre was established he became active in children's roles.

sen.j: 1955年に五代目を襲名。
sen.e: Inherited the 5th generation title in 1955.
Inherited the fifth generation title in 1955.
sen.cmt: fifthスペルアウトしました。
sen.e: Inherited the fifth generation title in 1955.

sen.j: 著書に「中村鶴蔵あんな話こんな話」。
sen.e: Writings 'This and that about Tsuruzo NAKAMURA '.
Writings: 'This and that about Tsuruzo NAKAMURA.'
sen.cmt: 前出の著書の表記と合せました。
sen.e: Writings: 'This and that about Tsuruzo NAKAMURA.'
